experiences.description: Leading full-stack development of a medical record and prescription management system with features like OCR-based report categorization, family sharing, and Aadhar-integrated login.
achievements: Designed and implemented secure user authentication with JWT and Aadhar verification
Integrated OCR to auto-categorize medical prescriptions and reports
Built role-based dashboards for patients, doctors, and admins
Enabled selective sharing of health records via email and WhatsApp

experiences.description: Built an image depixelation application using Flask and TensorFlow with SRGAN architecture. Reduced processing time by 30% through optimization techniques.
